attributes.action: Reduce road congestion by limit the hours of use for caravans on public roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is widely acknowledged that congestion on Britain's roads cost industry and individuals considerable amounts and also increase environmental damage. In an effort to address this, we believe that banning caravans from travelling on public roads between dawn and dusk will aid the government's targets for both reducing congestion and CO2 emissions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
